mapper.sql: id, member_id, type, symbol_type, masonry_num, give_member_id, collect_member_id, curday, curhour, curminute, order_num, create_time, update_time, is_valid,date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS create_time_str
mapper.insert: insert into u_masonry_list_log (id, member_id, type, symbol_type, masonry_num, give_member_id, collect_member_id, curday, curhour, curminute, order_num, create_time, update_time, is_valid) values (#{id}, #{memberId}, #{type}, #{symbolType}, #{masonryNum}, #{giveMemberId}, #{collectMemberId}, #{curday}, #{curhour}, #{curminute}, #{orderNum}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isValid})

mapper.update:
update u_masonry_list_log
member_id = #{memberId},
type = #{type},
symbol_type = #{symbolType},
task_id = #{taskId},
masonry_num = #{masonryNum},
give_member_id = #{giveMemberId},
collect_member_id = #{collectMemberId},
curday = #{curday},
curhour = #{curhour},
curminute = #{curminute},
order_num = #{orderNum},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_valid = #{isValid},
where id = #{id}

update u_masonry_list_log set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, symbol_type = #{symbolType,jdbcType=BIT}, masonry_num = #{masonryNum,jdbcType=REAL}, give_member_id = #{giveMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, collect_member_id = #{collectMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, curday = #{curday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, curhour = #{curhour,jdbcType=BIT}, curminute = #{curminute,jdbcType=BIT}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from u_masonry_list_log where 1=1
and member_id = #{memberId}
order by create_time
